sourcesContent:
<template>
  <GChart type="PieChart"  :data="chartData" :options="chartOptions" />
</template>
    
    <script>
import { GChart } from "vue-google-charts";

export default {
  name: "GoogleChart",
  components: {
    GChart,
  },
  data() {
    return {

      chartData: [
        ["Language", "Speakers (in millions)"],
        ["Assamese", 13],
        ["Bengali", 83],
        ["Bodo", 1.4],
        ["Dogri", 2.3],
        ["Gujarati", 46],
        ["Hindi", 300],
        ["Kannada", 38],
        ["Kashmiri", 5.5],
        ["Konkani", 5],
        ["Maithili", 20],
        ["Malayalam", 33],
        ["Manipuri", 1.5],
        ["Marathi", 72],
        ["Nepali", 2.9],
        ["Oriya", 33],
        ["Punjabi", 29],
        ["Sanskrit", 0.01],
        ["Santhali", 6.5],
        ["Sindhi", 2.5],
        ["Tamil", 61],
        ["Telugu", 74],
        ["Urdu", 52],
      ],

      chartOptions: {
        title: 'Indian Language Use',
          legend: 'none',
          pieSliceText: 'label',
          slices: {  4: {offset: 0.2},
                    12: {offset: 0.3},
                    14: {offset: 0.4},
                    15: {offset: 0.5},
          },
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
